Name: Drifting in Space
About the game: Patch 1: -Now switches automatically between mouse and joystick controls -buffed handling on first ship to be more forgiving -intro skips after playing once How far across the edge of space will you go? Embark on an epic journey to escape from your doomed galaxy. Legend speaks of one way out, created by something (or some...things) never seen before. Do you have what it takes to journey beyond the edge of space for your only way out? Drifting in Space is an action Rogue-lite for those with a love for difficult games. Inspired by the uncertainty of space itself along with all the movies, literature and games that accompany it. Enjoy.
